website_summaries.verdict: One of Tatcha's more affordable products that gently cleanses and exfoliates.
pros: This gel cleanser can be used daily to clean skin and exfoliate
Features amino acids that clean without drying out skin
Can help improve acne and good for sensitive skin
cons: The dispenser is difficult to use and can dispense too much product

customer_reviews.title: Glass half full :(
customer_reviews.text: I love this product but not when the bottle arrives sealed and only 3/4 full..... that’s either misleading or I got a dud. Either way, not what I expect for something so pricy. I don’t mind paying for high dollar items but at least give me what I pay for!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Graham

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: Completely broke me out in small hive like red bumps along my brow, chin, and forehead practically overnight after usage. For the price it is not worth it in the slightest. Not to mention the dispenser is a waste of product if you’re not absolutely careful. Tried it for a week and noticed no change other than the breakout was getting worse. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Zela

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing, however you can get it cheaper at your local Sephora.
customer_reviews.author: TimD

customer_reviews.title: Great face wash for combination-dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and usually dry skin around my mouth, especially in the winter and that's what made me change from CeraVe face wash to this one. I read a lot of reviews on Ulta and other sites and am extremely happy with this face wash. You only need a tiny bit of it, so the bottle will last you quite a while. The smell and texture is great, my skin doesn't feel dried out afterwards and it leaves me feeling refreshed without my skin turning red anywhere. HIGHLY recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to order another face cleanser. My pores started to get oily and my Clairins face wash was no longer working. I ordered Tatcha which I thought was a little expensive but after using it, I absolutely love it and It got rid of the oil, my pores look better, it’s lightweight and overall my skin looks great. I plan to purchase the moisturizer. It’s a little expensive but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DEEP CLEANSE is a terrific product
customer_reviews.text: I have used Tatcha now almost three years. I was happy with the Pure (the first/original cleanser). This is actually cheaper by 10 bucks or so and it exfoliates so it's like 2 in 1. I still use and love the original cleanser and rice powder but this is the best bargain in the whole Tatcha Line.
customer_reviews.author: Victorian Chick

customer_reviews.title: Glowing Skin.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this Tatcha gel cleanser for about 2 weeks. It looks like it's getting the job done since my face is glowing, and it's reducing my pores size. To be honest, I'm using a combination of products which I believe are rescuing my skin since it suddenly changed from oily to very dry due to possible hormonal changes. I've used Lather skin products for longer time, they are fantastic and less pricey compared to Tatcha. The Lather citrus balancing toner is excellent, and this is the one that I'm currently using along with the Tatcha cleanser. I'll keep trying Tatcha products to see if they work better than my so far favorite brand Lather.
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if they gave us a used bottle
customer_reviews.text: When i tried to use the product, it felt really empty. I had to squeeze the bottle to try and get the product out. I held the bottle up to the light and almost HALF of the product was gone (Before i even got to use any of it). Not sure if that's normal or not but for the amount I'm paying for this product, I had expected a full bottle. Luckily, it was an easy return.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Lim

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Makes my skin feel like I just had a facial. I love this stuff. It’s pricey, but definitely worth it to use in your routine once a week if you have sensitive skin like I do
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C

customer_reviews.title: Knock off
customer_reviews.text: Knock off. Doesnt feel the same. Doesnt smell the same. The product is missing 25 percent of content. not good
customer_reviews.author: krissy

customer_reviews.title: Skin feels so soft and pores are disappearing
customer_reviews.text: This is a great everyday cleanser. I tried the travel size before I made this purchase of the full size. I had to try it since I have extremely sensitive skin and to add I have psoriasis which can be hard to use many products without my face having a full flare rash. But, this cleanser has been great. I was first impressed by the price a great normal price for a great name product. I love that it has the exfoliating in it, it really helps with my psoriasis. I feel so fresh and my skin feels so good after each wash. And you don’t have to over due it. A small amount of cleanser goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Cc

customer_reviews.title: Cleanest face ever! You’ll love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only face wash I’ve ever used that I actually feel like fully cleanses my face. It can even take off my 24-hour matte foundation which no other face wash has been able to do. It’s also super gentle, which you wouldn’t expect because it’s exfoliating and so good at removing makeup and build up and stuff. The scent is great too, reminds me of a spa!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Simpson

customer_reviews.title: HALF FULL BOTTLE
customer_reviews.text: I use this in the shower so when I received my refill I immediately put it in my shower so I could use it the next time I showered. When I was showering the light was hitting the bottle & I had realized the bottle was HALF full. Like seriously? This is Tatcha, it’s expensive. Why would they only give me half the bottle. Love the product but I wish they would have given me the full bottle like I paid for!!
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Love this face wash, I just wish it wasn't as expensive. I keep coming back to this after trying cheaper alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: Nalee

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent.
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent and my face feels clean without over drying it. I do have oily skin so it may not work for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda ihc

customer_reviews.title: Exfoliates but moisturizes skin.
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleanser. It gently exfoliates but it highly moisturizing. Smells pleasant. I have purchased twice and will continue to do so. I do wish it was less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Angela P.

customer_reviews.title: Good For Acne Prone Skin
customer_reviews.text: Has worked great so far. My skin is extremely prone to drying and breakouts, and this cleanser is one of the very few that has not caused either of these.
customer_reviews.author: Arnthorr

customer_reviews.title: Product is ok.  Packaging could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Received this bottle that was starting to peel? As for the product, I was expecting a bit more ability to scrub. But other than that, its good.
customer_reviews.author: RJ G

customer_reviews.title: Review from New Jersey , U.S.A
customer_reviews.text: It seems pretty good! My face felt smooth and hydrated. I use it before bed. I've used it about 6 times in a row so far. Kinda just came in the mail. I'm a pretty heavy smoker so my face is getting pretty wrinkly so I hope it straightens out this high-milage looking mug of mine. Anyway, it's a thumbs up so far. Sincerely, LaSexorcisto
customer_reviews.author: LaSexorcisto

customer_reviews.title: Cleared up my adult acne
customer_reviews.text: Cleared up my troubled skin, a bit pricey but totally worth it- my skin suffers when I go a few days with out it
customer_reviews.author: J. Kladstrup

customer_reviews.title: Knock Off
customer_reviews.text: This is a knock off of the real version from Sephora
customer_reviews.author: Brad Isaacs

customer_reviews.title: This is a good product.
customer_reviews.text: Its just overpriced and it doesn't really have a scent.
customer_reviews.author: LeeLee

customer_reviews.title: Container tampered with
customer_reviews.text: The product is great but when I received it about 1 inch was missing from the bottle and looked like it had already been opened. I won’t order from you again
customer_reviews.author: Linda Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Best face wash ever
customer_reviews.text: Love this face wash! Washes makeup of and very clean. I am very sensitive and this works amazing!
customer_reviews.author: devon finch

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: I use a pea sized amount that goes a long way. I haven't been wearing make up since I started using this product and I've gotten more compliments than when I used wear make up on my giant pores.
customer_reviews.author: Kozmic

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!!! LOVE IT!! A MUST BUY MY SKIN FEELS INCREDIBLE!
customer_reviews.author: Brooklynn Hitte

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The beat for deep cleansing. Gets your face clean with NO irritation
customer_reviews.author: S  Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for the quality
customer_reviews.text: Too expensive for the results delivered. I had high hopes, but I don’t see any difference in my skin after using it for 2+ months.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: He doesn't irritate my skin at all
customer_reviews.text: I have been working for a long time recently, and I always feel that the cleaning of my face is not in place. I have tried many products. After using this product, I feel it is very useful for my skin, which is gentle and does not stimulate my skin at all.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Works well overall. I find face cleansers tend the dry my skin out after using. This one definitely isn’t as drying as others I’ve used. Quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It removes makeup very good. My skin feels very soft .
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Best facial cleanser I've tried yet!
customer_reviews.text: My skin has definitely improved. I am 32 and experience occasional acne which it has helped that greatly. It's gentle enough for daily use. It also seems to have helped the appearance of my pores which are large. I'll be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: abby green

customer_reviews.title: Non irritating yet exfoliating
customer_reviews.text: I usually can’t use exfoliating products. They irritate and break me out but these beads are not rough like others. It works well yet actually doesn’t break me out.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Goldsmith

customer_reviews.title: Great product that needs a new dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, my skin cleared up nicely. It feels really good. No complaints about the formula but u hate the bottle. I want to scream my head off when it squeezes out way too much. It seems like it should be in a higher end dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and don’t notice any benefit.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special other products give the same results for less money.
customer_reviews.author: bonnie currran

customer_reviews.title: Good product comes in bad container
customer_reviews.text: Container too hard to work with should have pump or soft tube and it took a long time to get it
customer_reviews.author: linda b.

customer_reviews.title: Much better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased a lot of products over the years. I have never had such quick results from a cleanser before. My skin is cleaner than ever and the pore size is reduced. I'm very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: tutusformama

customer_reviews.title: Clean feel and clearer face
customer_reviews.text: My wife will only use this face wash. She absolutely loves how clean she feels after she uses it compared to any other face wash. You don't need much for each use so it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Its okay
customer_reviews.text: It's a good cleanser but it's too pricey and there are cheaper ones that do the same job.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Persaud

customer_reviews.title: Tatcha is the best
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleanser for my combination skin. I use the dewy skin cream on top and my skin looks great! This bottle lasts months and months!
customer_reviews.author: Jonnie Glover

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable
customer_reviews.text: The best I have ever used on my skin,. I will keep using it! It makes my skin so clean and soft
customer_reviews.author: Janet anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this cleanser! It makes my skin feel so soft after using it. You don’t need to use much so it lasts a while too!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Scam
customer_reviews.text: Did not contain original tatcha product. Total scam, do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Amazing cleanser would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I love tatcha products in general but this cleaners is a staple in my routine.
customer_reviews.author: Lovemdead

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious, light and smells incredible.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after I received a sample from Sephora and loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Francine L.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very good exfoliating and soft result good on sensitive skin
customer_reviews.author: Abraham Abel Cisneros

customer_reviews.title: Silky soft
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that it doesn’t dry out my skin after using and leaves my skin soft. I’m not real crazy about the scent though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved the cleanser
customer_reviews.text: One of the best cleansers on market, definitely recommend. Bought one travel size for myself, loved it, bought two full sizes for mom and friend.
customer_reviews.author: Swatched

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the best cleanser I have ever used. It works perfectly for oily skin and after use I can feel a difference in my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob K

customer_reviews.title: A lot for your money
customer_reviews.text: One of the best products I’ve tried for pore reducing wash. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy!
customer_reviews.text: Yeah....this didn’t work for me. I tried it this morning for the first time and immediately broke out all over my face.
customer_reviews.author: Erikka C

customer_reviews.title: Great for oily skin!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product I can already see huge results in my skin after only a week!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase. My skin has improved so much. This product cleanses without drying out your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Had acne. Still have acne. Don't think this helped.
customer_reviews.text: Also didn't make it worse though and does smell nice.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Cleans very well!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! It leaves your skin very soft and clean without drying it.
customer_reviews.author: MARIA NEGRON

customer_reviews.title: Enlarged pores, acne, sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing product for enlarged pores, acne and sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. Such an intense yet gentle clean. Obsessed.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great skincare
customer_reviews.text: Such a good product. Leaves your skin feeling smooth and refreshed
customer_reviews.author: Apryl Trout

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I received a knockoff product. I have used this cleanser for years, I know what it smells and feels like. Foil cap was missing and product had obviously been replaced. Terrible product in Tatcha packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Katie B.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite face wash
customer_reviews.text: I love this face wash, it gently exfoliates without being too harsh. Make sure to use a good moisturizer along with it though. I've been happy with all Tatcha products, usually I order directly from their website because I'm skeptical of Amazon beauty products due to so many issues with knockoffs. This one appears legit!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Kauffman

customer_reviews.title: Know your skin type and read the product description
customer_reviews.text: I have oily skin, and have light adult acne. My skin is sensitive, and I had no problems with this product. It's easy to apply and wash off. I simply apply water to my face and take a little amount and rub it in. It is light and washes off easy and feels clean. I have no acne after starting to use the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clears face up fast
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by how well this worked. It cleared a few pimples I had in around 2 to 3 days. My face is looking a lot healthier now. Its a bit expensive but it works really well.
customer_reviews.author: L. Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It really gets in there and cleans without causing dryness. I got the dewy skin moisturizer and I love that product as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: great for oily faces
customer_reviews.text: my face has started to clear up a lot after I started using this product.
customer_reviews.author: valeria

customer_reviews.title: Great on skin
customer_reviews.text: My Daughter loves this product. She uses this all the time
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Tatcha Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Love Love this facial cleaser my face is so soft and hydrated. A little pricey!
customer_reviews.author: J. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Re-Ordered Many Times.
customer_reviews.text: The wife loves this stuff and I have re-ordered it a few times now. It seems a little pricey, but I suppose you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great for acne
customer_reviews.text: I buy this for my teenage daughter. It is the only cleanser that clears up her acne!
customer_reviews.author: Auanit

product_meta.title: Tatcha The Deep Cleanse: Non-irritating Daily Gel Cleanser to Hydrate, Exfoliate and Tighten Pores - 150 ml | 5 oz
feature_bullets: A DAILY GEL CLEANSER with natural fruit exfoliant that deeply but gently lifts impurities and unclogs pores, while leaving skin soft and hydrated.

OIL-FREE GEL lathers into a creamy foam to lift away dirt, oil and impurities without over-drying. It cleanses with amino acids derived from silk gentle enough for even the most delicate skin, leaving skin soft, refreshed and comfortably hydrated.

THE FORMULA HARNESSES the power of the Japanese Luffa fruit, a natural beauty multi-tasker beloved by Japanese women for centuries. Ground fibers from the fruit exfoliate, helping to turn over dead skin cells, deeply purifying & decongesting pores, while the fruit extract beautifies and conditions skin.
JAPANESE WILD ROSE works to visibly tighten pores and smooth skin texture, while Japanese Leopard Lily helps minimize excess oil.

FORMULATED WITHOUT: Mineral oil, synthetic fragrances, sulfate detergents, parabens, urea, DEA, TEA or phthalates. Oil-free. Non-comedogenic. Non-irritating. Non-sensitizing. Dermatologist tested. Cruelty-free.
